info.name: FFmpeg Utility API
info.description: FFmpeg wrapper utilities for video processing

request.description: Returns a list of available FFmpeg codecs
Returns a list of available FFmpeg encoders

Processes a video from a URL and returns multiple formats in a ZIP archive:

- PNG thumbnail (frame at 5s)
- 3-second GIF preview (320px width)
- Matroska (MKV) version with original video and audio streams
- H.265 MP4 version with AAC audio
- info.txt with metadata

Submit the video URL in a JSON body with the 'url' field.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
ZIP archive containing:
1. thumbnail.png (image/png) - Single frame screenshot
2. preview.gif (image/gif) - 3-second preview animation
3. video.mkv (video/x-matroska) - MKV with original streams
4. video.h265.mp4 (video/mp4) - H.265 encoded version
5. info.txt (text/plain) - Processing metadata
